name: Flame Bolt
description:
A **basic fire spell** that hurls a bolt of flame at a target, dealing *fire damage*.

**Effects:**
- Range: 60 feet
- Damage: 1d6 + caster level
- **Critical Hit:** Target catches fire for 1 round

bonusEffects.effectsDescription: Increased damage and chance to ignite target

name: Healing Touch
description:
A **gentle healing spell** that restores health to the target through *divine energy*.

> *"The touch of Odivshe brings comfort to the wounded."*

**Healing Amount:** 2d4 + Wisdom modifier

**Special:** Can be cast as a ritual to double the healing amount.

name: Mind Shield
description: Creates a protective barrier around the mind, defending against mental intrusions and psychic attacks.

bonusEffects.effectsDescription: Reflects mental attacks back to attacker

name: Nature's Call
description: Allows communication with animals and plants in the immediate area.

bonusEffects.effectsDescription: Can command simple actions from animals

name: Shadow Step
description:
Allows the caster to **teleport through shadows** from one location to another.

*The caster must be able to see the destination shadow.*

bonusEffects.effectsDescription: Can teleport to any shadow within range, even if not visible
